name: Phasmothievery
description: Phasmothievery is a game I made in under 48 hours for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam. The theme of the jam was combining genres, so I decided to combine horror with a top-down shoot em up. This game was inspired by Phasmophobia. In that game, you are tasked with exploring a haunted house and collecting evidence of paranormal activity. Instead of simply slowly exploring the house, I thought it would be more fun if you went in guns blazing, and tried to steal and destroy as much as you possibly can.  At the same time I also tried to keep some supernatural and spooky elements to the game, to fulfill the horror aspect.
